prompts: Create a tiny bug-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and can camouflage with its environment.
I want a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small aquatic creature with unique coloration patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that has a friendly appearance and is known for its quick movements in the wild.
Make a Pokemon with a shiny, iridescent shell that reflects light in various colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, often found near water sources.
Design a Pokemon that has a curious personality and loves to explore forests and grasslands.
Show me a bug-type Pokemon that can retreat into its shell when threatened.

distinctive_features: Rounded body with a shell-like structure
